description: Juicy chicken makes this quick and easy lentil and chickpea dahl extra satisfying.
name: Chicken Dahl Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chicken to the dahl with the lime juice and cook for 2 minutes. Serve with the rest of the coriander on top.
